files.patch: @@ -1259,2 +1259,2 @@ - * Sets the orientation for this menu and the associated popup component - * determined by the ComponentOrientation argument. + * Sets the orientation for this menu and its associated popup menu + * determined by the {@code ComponentOrientation} argument. @@ -1262,2 +1262,2 @@ - * @param o the new component orientation of this menu and - * the popup menu component contained within it. + * @param o the new orientation for this menu and + * its associated popup menu contained within it.
